# Ownfinance Pull Request Template

## Description

Please include a summary of the changes and the **motivation** behind this PR.  
Include any context relevant to reviewers (e.g., related issues, dependencies, etc.).

Fixes / Closes: # (issue number)

---

## Type of Change

Please select the type of change that applies:

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] CI/CD / DevOps update

---

## How Has This Been Tested?

Please describe the tests you ran to verify your changes. Include details such as:

- Unit tests
- Integration tests
- End-to-end tests
- Manual testing steps

Example:

```bash
npm run test
npm run lint
npm run type-check
